Empowering Youth Through Political Education

Building Indonesia's future through informed civic engagement and democratic participation.

Our Initiatives

Empowering Tomorrow's Leaders

A comprehensive approach to political education and youth engagement

Political Education

Tailored educational programs and workshops for youth to understand Indonesia's political landscape and processes.

Youth Engagement

Creating platforms for young Indonesians to actively participate in political discourse and decision-making.

Research & Analysis

Conducting research on youth political behaviors and publishing findings to inform policy development.

Events & Workshops

Organizing engaging events, seminars, and workshops that bridge the gap between youth and political institutions.

About Us

Building Indonesia's Democratic Future

Founded in 2020, Generasi Melek Politik (GMP) is a professional network dedicated to elevating political literacy among Indonesian youth.

We bridge the gap between complex political systems and young citizens through research-backed education, strategic collaborations, and innovative engagement programs.

Research-driven educational content and programs

Strategic partnerships with government and civic organizations

Professional development for emerging political leaders

Our Network

Strategic Partners

Collaborating with leading institutions to enhance our impact across Indonesia.

Ready to Make a Difference?

Join our network of politically engaged youth and help shape Indonesia's democratic future.

Generasi Melek Politik (GMP) adalah sebuah organisasi non-profit yang bergerak untuk memberikan pendidikan politik untuk anak muda (17-25 tahun) dengan cara yang menyenangkan!
